entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as a person who does not bother to knock on the door, instead striding straight inside. She is also holding tight to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being held tight by Umbridge and is described as not recognizing a wizard with very short, wiry hair.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is sitting behind his desk, described as serene, with the tips of his long fingers together.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is standing rigidly beside Dumbledore, her face extremely tense.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as the Minister of Magic, rocking backward and forward on his toes, apparently immensely pleased with the situation.

entities.name: shacklebolt
entities.description: Shacklebolt is positioned on one side of the door like a guard.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is hovering excitedly beside the wall, holding a quill and a heavy scroll of parchment in his hands.

relationships.description: Umbridge is holding tight to Harry.
McGonagall is standing rigidly beside Dumbledore.
Fudge is described as being immensely pleased with the situation.
Shacklebolt is positioned on one side of the door like a guard.
Percy Weasley is hovering excitedly beside the wall.
